titleStmt.title: Here begynneth a merry ieste of a shrewde and curste wyfe, lapped in morrelles skin, for her good behauyour
Merry jeste of a shrewde and curste wyfe, lapped in morrelles skin, for her good behavyour.
titleStmt.author: Bramis, Joannes.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fleetestrete, beneath the Conduite, at the signe of Saint Iohn Euaungelist, by H. Jackson,

notesStmt.note: Probably a translation, but original title not traced.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
